Cheap Hostels in Paris

Want to be in the heart of the city but don’t think you have the budget? Then why not take a look at our fantastic list of cheap hostels in Paris? Hostels usually combine great value accommodation with a host of useful facilities such as communal kitchens, and gardens or courtyards. Most offer a choice of private guest rooms and dorms, making them ideal for everyone, whether you’re a backpacker, a solo traveller, visiting with the family or with a group of friends. Just don’t forget – what you save on the accommodation, you can spend on the fun!
